Step 1: Acknowledge the win
Recognition is the first thing you need to do when you achieve something, no matter how small it might seem. By appreciating your efforts and progress, you keep your motivation high.

Step 2: Share your success
Sometimes, we are so focused on the bigger picture that we forget to share our mini-milestones. Share your small wins with friends, family or a mentor. This act of sharing not only increases your confidence but also enhances your self-esteem.

Step 3: Reward yourself 
One of the best ways to keep yourself motivated is by rewarding your efforts, and that includes small achievements too. It can be anything from treating yourself to your favorite meal, reading a book, or watching a movie.

Step 4: Record your achievement
Keep a personal achievement diary or a visual representation of your completed tasks. Recording your progress can provide tangible evidence of your achievements and becomes a great motivator to keep going.

Step 5: Use it as fuel 
Use each success, no matter how small, as fuel for the next step. Every achievement is a testament to your abilities and persistence. Harness this to push yourself further towards your bigger goals.
